text:
I would like to express my sincere gratitude to Duty Manager Naqiah for her outstanding service during my 'staycaymoon.' From the moment I arrived, she went above and beyond to ensure that my stay was not only comfortable but truly special. Her warmth, attentiveness, and professionalism made a lasting impression, and I genuinely appreciated the personalized care she provided.

She was always ready to assist with any requests, making sure every detail of my stay was perfect. Her friendly demeanor and willingness to go the extra mile truly enhanced the overall experience. Itâ€™s rare to come across such dedicated service, and I am incredibly grateful for the effort she put into making my time there so memorable.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay, and I cannot thank Naqiah and the team enough for their hospitality. It was an experience I will cherish, and I will certainly be recommending this place to family and friends. Thank you once again for making my 'staycaymoon' so wonderful!

Staffs were very friendly and helpful. Despite being in a prime location the atmosphere was very peaceful. The rooms had most of the amenities. Breakfast was fresh and varied. I will definitely stay there again during my next visit and would recommend my friends and family as well.

Our stay at Singapore Holiday Inn Express was excellent.  We reserved a Queen and 2 single interconnection room.  Everything was excellent.  The rooms were very clean, fresh and cool.  We arrived at 6:30 am and was able to get an early check in after breakfast which was perfect.  The breakfast buffet had a variety options.  I would definitely recommend and visit again.

Amazing experience! We had a wonderful 5 nights stay here and we simply loved our time spent at this hotel! The room was so comfortable and check in and check out both was smooth and fast. The staff are welcoming and helpful and the breakfast had great options everyday and was so delicious! Special thanks to Manager Naqiah, she help us alot during our stay. i will never forget her sweet smile! Location is perfect and we would love to come back here again! Highly recommend!

The hotel is in a good location on Orchard Road. There are many places to eat and shop nearby. To get to the nearest subway station, just cross the intersection at the traffic lights; it's at Somerset station, below the 313 mall. The rooms are clean, and the staff are friendly. The prices are reasonable. I recommend it.
